<title level="1" right="Trait">[Companion](/Traits.aspx?ID=29)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 629 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

An item with this trait can be worn by an [animal companion](/animal-companions) or similar creature. A companion can have up to two items invested.
